ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: woe that Day to the deniers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Will be the day of woe for those
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Woe, then, on that Day to those who give the lie (to this Message)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Woe will be to those who rejected the Truth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So on that day, ruin is for those who deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then woe that Day to those who denied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So woe on that day to those who reject (the truth),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: woe that day unto those that cry lies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then woe that day unto the deniers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Woe on that Day to those who deny the truth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Woe, then, will be on that Day to the beliers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: woe to the deniers on that day
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then woe that Day to those that treat (Truth) as Falsehood;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then woe that Day to the beliers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day woe to those who belied
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Woe on that Day to the deniers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:11] Woe then, terrible chastisement [will come], on that day to the deniers, of the messengers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then woe) then severe chastisement (that day) which is the Day of Judgement (unto the deniers) of Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an; the reference here is to Abu Jahl and his host
